sentences.en: ‘I did no such thing ,’ he protested.
sentences.cn: “我没干过这样的事。”他抗议道。

sentences.en: a film in which he does the bad-guy thing.
sentences.cn: 一部他在里面饰演坏人的影片。

sentences.en: Getting more American ideas into British business would be a good thing .
sentences.cn: 将更多的美国式理念注入英国商界会是一件好事。

sentences.en: He hadn't eaten a thing except for one forkful of salad.
sentences.cn: 除了一餐叉色拉，他什么都没吃。

sentences.en: He was the fastest thing I ever saw on a baseball field.
sentences.cn: 他是我在棒球场上见过的跑得最快的家伙。

sentences.en: He would be the last person who would do such a thing.
sentences.cn: 他最不可能干这种事情。

sentences.en: I know a thing or two (= a lot ) about dogs.
sentences.cn: 我对狗所知甚详。

sentences.en: I plan to do all the things I’ve been meaning to do for ages.
sentences.cn: 我打算去做我多年以来一直想做的事。

sentences.en: I really feel aggrieved at this sort of thing.
sentences.cn: 我真为这种事感到委屈。

sentences.en: I think prison is going to be a scary thing for Harry.
sentences.cn: 我觉得蹲监狱对于哈里会是件很可怕的事。

sentences.en: I would be remiss if I did not do some-thing about it.
sentences.cn: 如果我对此不做点儿什么，就是不负责任。

sentences.en: I’ll just switch this thing off.
sentences.cn: 我把这东西关一下。

sentences.en: I'm sorry. That was a hateful thing to say.
sentences.cn: 对不起，我不该说那么难听的话。

sentences.en: In a democracy, it is no bad thing to be able to compromise (= it is good, even though it may not seem good ) .
sentences.cn: 在民主国家，能够妥协并非就是坏事。

sentences.en: it just does things to me when we kiss.
sentences.cn: 我们亲吻时我兴奋不已。

sentences.en: It was a horrible thing to happen.
sentences.cn: 发生这样的事情太糟糕了。

sentences.en: One thing I am sure of was that she was scared.
sentences.cn: 有一点我能肯定，那就是她当时被吓到了。

sentences.en: People say things they don’t mean when they are angry.
sentences.cn: 人生气时就会口不择言。

sentences.en: physical attraction was one thing, love was quite another.
sentences.cn: 外表的吸引是一回事，爱情可就另当别论。

sentences.en: she had a thing about men who wore glasses.
sentences.cn: 她特喜欢（或讨厌）戴眼镜的男人。

sentences.en: That’s a terrible thing to say .
sentences.cn: 这话说得太难听了。

sentences.en: The best thing to do when entering unknown territory is smile.
sentences.cn: 踏入未知地带最好的对策就是微笑。

sentences.en: The first thing to do is to give them food and shelter.
sentences.cn: 首要的事是给他们提供食物和住所。

sentences.en: The most amazing thing about nature is its infinite variety.
sentences.cn: 大自然最让人惊叹的是它的无限多样性。

sentences.en: The newspaper job had me doing the same thing day after day.
sentences.cn: 这份报社的工作让我日复一日地做着同样的事。

sentences.en: The one thing I look forward to is going punting in Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 我期盼的一件事就是在剑桥乘坐平底船畅游。

sentences.en: The only thing that rankles me is what she says about Ireland.
sentences.cn: 唯一使我耿耿于怀的就是她那些关于爱尔兰的言论。

sentences.en: There was a round metal thing on the path.
sentences.cn: 小路上有一个圆圆的金属物。

sentences.en: This proposal is by no means a sure thing.
sentences.cn: 这个提议绝不会理所当然地获得通过。

sentences.en: This put me in mind of some-thing Patrick said many years ago.
sentences.cn: 这使我想起多年前帕特里克曾说过的话。

sentences.en: What had he been thinking about? A kitten, of all things!.
sentences.cn: 他一直在想什么呢？竟然是一只小猫。

sentences.en: What’s that red thing?
sentences.cn: 那个红色的东西是什么？

sentences.en: Why hadn't he arranged to see her at the house? For one thing, it would have been warmer.
sentences.cn: 他当时为什么不安排在屋里见她？首先，屋里会比较暖和。

words.tran_cn: 某人；某东西（对不知名或暂时忘记名字的人或事物的代称，等于thingumabob）
迷信,着魔,疯狂,憎恶,恐怖
事情,事物,成分,实质,个体
条款,器具,设备,到手之物,稀奇玩艺
目标,对象,意图,意义,抱负
行为,动作,筹划,努力,功效

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)命里注定的事，不可避免的事；必须接受（或承认）的事

phrases.phrase: be all things to all men (或 people)
be on to a good thing
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)找到合适或待遇高的工作；过着舒适的生活
(非正式)做自己爱做的事；按自己的意愿行事
(非正式)对…施加显著影响；使受震撼
第一件事；一大早；最重要的事情
好东西，好事情；美好的事
(非正式)对…有一种病态（或强烈）的爱好（或厌恶）；对…抱有偏见
(非正式)把…看作必要，认为…必不可少
新事物；随意即席演奏的爵士乐
终止不幸；没有的事，完全不对
（表示惊讶）偏偏；真没想到，怎么搞的
最不想要的事物；最不适宜的事
过去的事；已没关系的事

trans.tran_cn: 事件，形势，东西，事物，家伙，事业
trans.tran_en: an idea, action, feeling, or fact that someone thinks, does, says, or talks about, or that happens
an idea, action, feeling, or fact that someone thinks, does, says, or talks about, or that happens
